pages.title: Misc Ingredients
pages.text: Crossroads adds a few crafting ingredients and byproducts. The important ones are listed here.$(br2)

<item>Salt/$: A crafting ingredient. Also $(l:essentials:fluid/centrifuge)produced/$ or $(l:essentials:heat/salt_reactor)consumed/$ by a few machines.$(br2)<item>Salt/$ can be made <item>Salt Blocks/$, which will kill plants around them, allowing you to literally salt the earth. They also kill any slimes or creepers that touch them.$(br2)
<item>Slag/$: A byproduct of $(l:essentials:rotary/blast)ore tripling/$. It can be used as bonemeal, and has some crafting uses.$(br2)
<item>Pure Quartz/$: Used as a crafting ingredient in everything <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$.$(br2)
